name: Heretic`s Tome
description: A burst of concentrated negative energy erupts from you.

name: Dementia
description: A flash of pure cold freezes nearby enemies. This spell freezes enemies for its duration. Enemies resistant to freeze effects will suffer a reduced duration.

name: Malformed Effigy
description: Retaliates with a blast of poisonous fumes, poisoning all nearby enemies.

name: Stormcaller`s Effigy
description: Zaps the target with lightning which can leap to nearby targets.

name: Banshee`s Misery
description: "Wails of misery emanate from this tome with every page turn."

name: Black Grimoire of Og`Napesh
description: "The dark writings of Og`Napesh, condemned necromancer."

name: Storm Scion
description: Sparks of lightning erupt from you, damaging any enemies they come in contact with.

name: Virulent Maw
description: "The rotting head emits a foul stench, but the toxins it produces are even more vile."

name: Word of Inquisitor Abalon
description: "Inquisitor Abalon was one of the most daring inquisitors of his time, willing to make use of any relic so long as it ultimately served the security of the empire. Some would later call his methods heresy."

name: Tome of the Arcane Wastes

description: Creates an arcane seal on the ground imbued with destructive force.

description: Conjure a storm of static energy.
